news.headline: Amazon Plans to Invest at Least $11 Billion on Cloud, AI Infrastructure in Georgia
news.summary: By Kimberley Kao Amazon plans to spend at least $11 billion to expand its cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure in Georgia, as global tech companies boost their data-center footprints...

news.headline: AI Startup Anthropic Raising Funds Valuing It at $60 Billion
news.summary: Anthropic is in advanced talks to raise $2 billion in a deal that would value it at $60 billion, more than triple its valuation from a year ago.  The funding round is being led by the venture firm Lightspeed Venture Partners, people familiar with the matter said.  The $60 billion valuation includes

news.headline: Amazon's AWS to invest $11 billion in Georgia to boost AI infrastructure development
news.summary: Big Tech companies are pouring billions into artificial intelligence, highlighting the growing need for robust data centers and advanced infrastructure to support AI-driven innovations and cloud services. news.headline: AWS says it'll invest 'at least' $11B to expand data center infrastructure in Georgia
news.summary: On Tuesday, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Amazon's cloud computing division, said that it plans to invest "at least" $11 billion in Georgia to expand its infrastructure to support various cloud computing and AI technologies. AWS estimates that its investment will create roughly 550 jobs in the state. "
